# firewalla-msp_boxes (Data Source)

Data source for fetching Firewalla Boxes

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "firewalla-msp_boxes" "home_box" {
  filter_group = "home"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `filter_group` (String) Filter Boxes by Group

### Read-Only

- `boxes` (Attributes List) List of Boxes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--boxes))

<a id="nestedatt--boxes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `boxes`

Read-Only:

- `gid` (String)
- `group` (String)
- `model` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `online` (Boolean)
- `publicip` (String)
